annotations.description: Many bartenders were excited by the arrival of Bulleit Bourbon on the market, Jon Santer included. He created this simple spin on a Manhattan in 2004 when
annotations.title: PUNCH | Revolver Cocktail Recipe

textContent:
2 ounces bourbon, preferably Bulleit
1/2 ounce coffee liqueur
2 dashes orange bitters
Flamed orange peel garnish

Stir and strain into coupe
Garnish by flaming orange peel

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/revolver/
title: Revolver
